dcterms:creator: S. Yu
D. Tan
T. Tan
dcterms:description: CASIA-B is a popular dataset that includes cross-view and multi-walking condition sequences of 124 subjects, considering three walking conditions: normal walking, walking with bags, and walking in coats, with each group containing 11 different views.
dcterms:title: CASIA-B

dcterms:creator: Z. Zhu
X. Guo
T. Yang
J. Huang
J. Deng
G. Huang
D. Du
J. Lu
J. Zhou
dcterms:description: GREW is a large outdoor gait dataset with 128,671 sequences captured by 882 cameras from 26,345 subjects, typically divided into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: GREW

dcterms:creator: N. Takemura
Y. Makihara
D. Muramatsu
T. Echigo
Y. Yagi
dcterms:description: OU-MVLP is a large dataset with cross-view sequences of 10,307 subjects, containing two groups with 14 different views, used for evaluating gait recognition performance.
dcterms:title: OU-MVLP
